set.name: DMSD-01 New Hero Deck: Joe's Jokers

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, this creature can attack your opponent and breaks an additional shield for each of your other Jokers in the battle zone until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-01 New Hero Deck: Joe's Jokers

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a creature and tap or untap it.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-01 New Hero Deck: Joe's Jokers

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's tapped creatures and put it on the bottom of their deck.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-01 New Hero Deck: Joe's Jokers

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, put a card from your graveyard into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 12000 or less.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-01 New Hero Deck: Joe's Jokers

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy all your opponent's creatures that have power 2000 or less.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-01 New Hero Deck: Joe's Jokers

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creature that has power 3000 or less. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-01 New Hero Deck: Joe's Jokers

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature can attack your opponent on the turn you put it into the battle zone. ■ This creature attacks your opponent each turn if able. ■ While you have 2 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, this creature gets +3000 power and has "double breaker". (A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-01 New Hero Deck: Joe's Jokers

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever a creature attacks you, you may tap this creature to stop the attack.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-01 New Hero Deck: Joe's Jokers

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Jokers creature from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-01 New Hero Deck: Joe's Jokers

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your Jokers creatures cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Set
